item.title: [SYNAPSE-740] Synapse throws "org.apache.http.ProtocolException: Transfer-encoding header already present" on multiple sends to client
item.description:
<sequence name="main">
<in>

<sequence key="stockquote"/>
</in>
<out>

</sequence>
